DOC.brief_title: The Effective Treatment Oral Helicobacter Pylori With Success Rate Gastric Eradication
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : The present study aim explore relationship Helicobacter pylorus ( H. pylorus ) oral cavity success rate eradication gastric H. pylorus infection . Study Design Setting : 202 symptomatic 148 asymptomatic individual recruit test use Saliva H. pylorus antigen test ( HPS ) , H. pylorus flagellin ( HPF ) , urea breathe test ( UBT ) polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) test . Test subject also receive various treatment . We collect data HPS , HPF , PCR UBT treatment 202 symptomatic patient 148 asymptomatic individual group . After drug treatment , run HPS , HPF , PCR UBT test . If test HPS , HPF PCR show negative indicate success oral H.pylori eradication . If test UBT show negative indicate success stomach H.pyloi eradication . We also compare suceess rate eradication stomach infection without oral H. pylorus infection .
